tagline: Keyword research, meta optimization, content structure, and search intent mapping
pros: Data-driven — every recommendation backed by search console data and keyword research
Creates content briefs that writers actually enjoy working from
Balances quick wins with long-term topical authority building
Explains SEO in plain language — no jargon gatekeeping
cons: Can be overly cautious about timelines — sometimes undersells quick wins
May prioritize search volume over brand voice in content recommendations
Technical SEO audits can scope-creep into full site rebuilds

model_recommendations.notes: Solid reasoning + good writing. Benefits from thinking but doesn't need max reasoning. Best cost/capability balance.
